mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_DT, M.MENU_KIND, M.MENU_FILE_NAME FROM LOG L RIGHT JOIN MENU M ON L.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO WHERE USR_NO = #{user_number}

SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_DT , M.MENU_KIND , F.FOOD_NAME FROM FOOD_SET FS , MENU M , FOOD F WHERE M.MENU_NO = FS.MENU_NO AND FS.FOOD_NO = F.FOOD_NO AND M.MENU_KIND = #{menu_kind} AND M.MENU_DT >= ADDDATE( CURDATE(), - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) AND M.MENU_DT <= ADDDATE( CURDATE(), - WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) + 4 ) ORDER BY M.MENU_DT , M.MENU_NO
